subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: In the seventh matchup of Japanese starters in the major leagues, Hiroki Kuroda pitched well, but the rookie Yu Darvish was brilliant pitching into the ninth as the Rangers shut out the Yankees.
snippet: In the seventh matchup of Japanese starters in the major leagues, Hiroki Kuroda pitched well, but the rookie Yu Darvish was brilliant pitching into the ninth as the Rangers shut out the Yankees.
